content.description: parallel programming outcome (2017 Fall, Final, Question 8 b)

p.line: The following is a helper command that increases _BOLDS_SALARY_BOLDE_. Below each script on the right, write ALL the possible values of _BOLDS_SALARY_BOLDE_ after the script has run to completion. (The _BOLDS_launch_BOLDE_ block allows its input script to run in parallel, and does not wait for its input to be finished before proceeding to the next block below it)

content.hint: two sequences, each has three random-length waiting slots influencing three tasks to do; consider the different possible orders.
